page.title: 13Scunthorpe Family Weekend II
page.content: Other atractions in the park were {stands}organised by local firms; displays put on by local{clubs}such as judo and karate; break dancing; a disco; clog dancing; and keep fit. This year there was also a special display of unarmed combat, absailing from a helicopter, parachuting and a motor cycle display: all done by the {Royal Marines.} Each year a famous personality makes a personal appearance. For the last eight years it has been a{TV personality and this year it was Jon Pertwee (Worzel Gummidge) and Don Estell. Family weekend is very popular and makes a good two days out for anyone.
